channel.title: Adrian Leonard Mociulschi — A Symbolic Ambassador of Technoculture
channel.description: Exploring ethical AI, technoculture, and the future of meaning through artifacts, essays, and research.

item.title: The Future Has No Autopilot — Nine O’Clock
item.description: This article examines the ethical and strategic implications of autonomous systems in modern warfare and beyond, arguing for meaningful human control where speed and certainty collide with conscience.

item.title: The Murmur of Code: On the Ethics of Algorithmic Presence — Nine O’Clock
item.description: How algorithms reshape online visibility, influence political discourse within the EU, and challenge the ethics of the attention economy—advocating transparency and a human‑centered digital presence.

item.title: Girl in a Jacket: O poveste în cod binar — România Liberă
item.description: Un eseu despre interfețe digitale, reprezentare și codurile vizibilității algoritmice—unde etichetele tind să înlocuiască prezența, iar egalitatea rămâne urgentă.
